column4: Does anyone know a room where there are people that can help with Feisty upgrade help using Update Manager?

I used update manager to upgrade to Feisty but internet connection dropped half way through. Now Update Manager doesn't recognise that the Feisty update is available. So I can't resume and cant find any fix on the wiki. Any help?
youd be better off being a lot more specific
what troubles exactly are you having with your upgrade?
I used update manager to upgrade to feisty...
sorry.  you'll have to highlight your messages with my name in front or i'll miss them easily
what happened after your network dropped?
are you on edgy now?  feisty?  frankenstein?
when the line dropped out it very cleverly and automatically reverted all files back to edgy
ok what happens if you run update-manager again?
it doesn't give the "upgrade to feisty" button up the top. No matter how often I refresh.
interesting.  dont you have to throw parameters to update-manager, though  like -c or -d?
I'll give ait a quick try
just "gksu update-manager -c" actually but -d wouldnt have done anything
I'll try it out in a minute and let you know how I go..
